subject: Baseball
World Series
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: In his first three at-bats, Josh Hamilton had a broken-bat grounder to short, a fly out to left and a strikeout, before driving in the tying run in the ninth inning.
snippet: In his first three at-bats, Josh Hamilton had a broken-bat grounder to short, a fly out to left and a strikeout, before driving in the tying run in the ninth inning.
